field.name: Open external links in new tab
field.description: If set to true, external links will open in a new window or tab, have the target attribute set to "_blank" and the rel attribute set to "noopener"

field.name: Address fields based on
field.description: Address fields are used in e.g. Checkout, Quote, Customer center etc. Dynamicweb frontend address format can be defined in Settings/Ecommerce/Internalization/Countries

field.name: Enable offcanvas minicart
field.description: NB: "CartService" and "CartSummary" service pages (Swift tools/Services) and navigation tags are required.

field.name: Offcanvas minicart behaviour
field.description: The offcanvas minicart can appear when "add to cart" event is triggered - and when you click the "cart navigation link" in the menus.

option.name: Open when "cart navigation link" is clicked

field.name: Device rendering
field.description: Responsive renders both mobile and desktop header and footer and reacts to browser resize. Adaptive requires a reload when in mobile view, but is faster.

field.name: Disable wide breakpoints (media query)
field.description: Disable extra wide breakpoint (min-width: 1600px) and ultra wide breakpoint (min-width: 1920px).

option.name: Disable both wide and ultra wide breakpoints

field.name: Custom header include
field.description: A .cshtml file to extend the html head section just before the body

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: General theme
field.description: For the whole site

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images
Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Google API key
field.description: Is used for the Locations Map and for Places autocomplete. Remember to enable the services and add a credit card in Google Cloud.

field.name: Open Graph Image
field.description: og:image (An image URL which should represent your object within the graph)

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Open Graph Image ALT
field.description: og:image:alt (A description of what is in the image (not a caption). If the page specifies an og:image it should specify og:image:alt)

field.name: Open Graph Description
field.description: og:description (A one to two sentence description of your object)

field.name: Open Graph Site Name
field.description: og:site_name (If your object is part of a larger web site, the name which should be displayed for the overall site. e.g., 'IMDb')

field.name: Twitter Site
field.description: twitter:site (@username for the website used in the card footer)

field.name: Twitter URL
field.description: twitter:url (Your websites URL)

field.name: Twitter Image
field.description: twitter:image (Twitter Card support an aspect ratio of 1:1 with minimum dimensions of 144x144 or maximum of 4096x4096 pixels. Images must be less than 5MB in size.)

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Twitter Image ALT
field.description: twitter:image:alt (A text description of the image conveying the essential nature of an image to users who are visually impaired. Maximum 420 characters.)

field.name: Tracking ID (Deprecated)
field.description: Your unique "UA-" id for the website

field.name: Google tag manager ID
field.description: Your unique "GTM-" id for the website

field.name: Measurement ID
field.description: Your unique "G-" id for the website

field.name: Enable Debug Mode
field.description: Enable GA4 "debug_mode" for logged in backend users

field.name: Hide price when ERP connection is down
Hide Add to Cart when ERP connection is down
Hide stock state when ERP connection is down
Behavior when ERP is down
field.description: Defines the additional behavior of the cart and checkout if the ERP connection is lost.

field.name: ERP is down redirect page link
